code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signup(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({id:'',password:'',name:'',phone:''});const[passwordConfirm,setPasswordConfirm]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('/usedb/signup',formData);}catch(error){console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("body",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC774\uB984"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uD734\uB300\uD3F0 \uBC88\uD638"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",id:"phone",name:"phone",value:formData.phone,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC544\uC774\uB514"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"id",name:"id",value:formData.id,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",children:"\uC911\uBCF5\uD655\uC778"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",value:formData.password,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638 \uD655\uC778"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:passwordConfirm,onChange:e=>setPasswordConfirm(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\uD68C\uC6D0\uAC00\uC785"})})]})})});}export default Signup;
